product_name: Benchmade Saddle Mountain Fixed Blade Knife
long_description: Built from advanced materials usually reserved for spaceships and surgical equipment, the advanced Benchmade Saddle Mountain Fixed Blade Knife provides refined performance and rugged durability. CPM-S30V premium stainless-steel blade. Laminated Dymondwood handle. The Benchmade Saddle Mountain Fixed Blade Knife includes a rich leather pressure-fit sheath with integrated guard.
short_description: Built from advanced materials usually reserved for spaceships and surgical equipment, the advanced Benchmade Saddle Mountain Fixed Blade Knife provides refined performance and rugged durability.
